card.name: Adrix and Nev, Twincasters
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

card.name: Adrix and Nev, Twincasters
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

card.name: Alibou, Ancient Witness
card.text: Other artifact creatures you control have haste. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control attack, Alibou, Ancient Witness deals X damage to any target and you scry X, where X is the number of tapped artifacts you control.

card.name: Ancient Den
card.text: {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Angel of the Ruins
card.text: Flying When Angel of the Ruins enters the battlefield, exile up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments. Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

card.name: Archaeomancer's Map
card.text: When Archaeomancer's Map enters the battlefield, search your library for up to two basic Plains cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player controls more lands than you, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Audacious Reshapers
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Audacious Reshapers deals damage to you equal to the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Battlemage's Bracers
Boros Locket
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Boros Locket: Draw two cards.

card.name: Bosh, Iron Golem
card.text: Trample {3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost to any target.

card.name: Breena, the Demagogue
card.text: Flying Whenever a player attacks one of your opponents, if that opponent has more life than another of your opponents, that attacking player draws a card and you put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control.

card.name: Breena, the Demagogue
card.text: Flying Whenever a player attacks one of your opponents, if that opponent has more life than another of your opponents, that attacking player draws a card and you put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control.

card.name: Bronze Guardian
card.text: Double strike Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Other artifacts you control have ward {2}. Bronze Guardian's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Combustible Gearhulk
card.text: First strike When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total converted mana cost of those cards.

card.name: Commander's Sphere
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

card.name: Cursed Mirror
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. As Cursed Mirror enters the battlefield, you may have it become a copy of any creature on the battlefield until end of turn, except it has haste.

card.name: Daretti, Scrap Savant
card.text: +2: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. −2: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield. −10: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step." Daretti, Scrap Savant can be your commander.

card.name: Darksteel Citadel
card.text: Indestructible {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Digsite Engineer
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."

card.name: Duplicant
card.text: Imprint — When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

card.name: Excavation Technique
card.text: Demonstrate (When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.) Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates two Treasure tokens.

card.name: Faithless Looting
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Feldon of the Third Path
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Great Furnace
card.text: {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Hedron Archive
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.

card.name: Hellkite Tyrant
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever Hellkite Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.

card.name: Ichor Wellspring
card.text: When Ichor Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Laelia, the Blade Reforged
card.text: Haste Whenever Laelia, the Blade Reforged attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Whenever you exile one or more cards from your library and/or your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Laelia.

card.name: Losheel, Clockwork Scholar
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to attacking artifact creatures you control. Whenever one or more artifact creatures enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Meteor Golem
card.text: When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Mind Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

card.name: Monologue Tax
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, you create a Treasure token.

card.name: Myr Battlesphere
card.text: When Myr Battlesphere enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens. Whenever Myr Battlesphere attacks, you may tap X untapped Myr you control. If you do, Myr Battlesphere gets +X/+0 until end of turn and deals X damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

card.name: Osgir, the Reconstructor
card.text: Vigilance {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {X}, {T}, Exile an artifact with mana value X from your graveyard: Create two tokens that are copies of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.text: Vigilance {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {X}, {T}, Exile an artifact with mana value X from your graveyard: Create two tokens that are copies of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Ruin Grinder
card.text: Menace When Ruin Grinder dies, each player may discard their hand and draw seven cards. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card. Reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Sculpting Steel
card.text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.text: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Steel Hellkite
card.text: Flying {2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Steel Overseer
card.text: {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each artifact creature you control.

card.name: Study Hall
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. When you spend this mana to cast your commander, scry X, where X is the number of times it's been cast from the command zone this game.

card.name: Thopter Engineer
card.text: When Thopter Engineer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. Artifact creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

card.name: Thousand-Year Elixir
card.text: You may activate abilities of creatures you control as though those creatures had haste. {1}, {T}: Untap target creature.

card.name: Triplicate Titan
card.text: Flying, vigilance, trample When Triplicate Titan dies, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with flying, a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with vigilance, and a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token with trample.

card.name: Wake the Past
card.text: Return all artifact cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Willowdusk, Essence Seer
card.text: {1}, {T}: Choose another target creature. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you lost this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Willowdusk, Essence Seer
card.text: {1}, {T}: Choose another target creature. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you lost this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Zaffai, Thunder Conductor
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value is 5 or greater, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. If that spell's mana value is 10 or greater, Zaffai, Thunder Conductor deals 10 damage to an opponent chosen at random.

card.name: Zaffai, Thunder Conductor
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1. If that spell's mana value is 5 or greater, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. If that spell's mana value is 10 or greater, Zaffai, Thunder Conductor deals 10 damage to an opponent chosen at random.
